name: pathfinders-monorepo

scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.setup: npm uninstall -g vite && rm -rf client/node_modules client/package-lock.json && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix BackEnd/server && npm install --prefix BackEnd/server @mapbox/polyline @turf/turf node-fetch@2 axios

description: Generate suitable running routes based on user preferences, customized to individual users
